abstract: Despite a very bad year, the chiefs of both Bear Stearns and Morgan Stanley are holding on to their power.
snippet: Despite a very bad year, the chiefs of both Bear Stearns and Morgan Stanley are holding on to their power.
lead_paragraph: James E. Cayne and John J. Mack have a lot in common. The chiefs of both Bear Stearns and Morgan Stanley have presided over announcements of steep losses this week and have forgone bonuses.

headline.main: Not a Jolly Season for 2 Top Bankers
headline.print_headline: Not a Jolly Season For 2 Top Bankers
